citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1045 am on
06/28/2016.
Inspector knocked at front door with no answer at 1045 am, waited 30 minutes and tried door again with no answer,
then called phone number on file and left message.

narrative:
